name: Misery Versus The Android
description: The "Mercy" gun follows enemies and guarantees an efficient death. The "Revenge" gun fires in several directions and causes widespread destruction to the environment. The "Loathsome" gun ensures that you never have to look at your enemies' ugly mugs again. The "Trick" gun fires oscillating projectiles that confuse your opponents. The "Light" gun releases pulses that can penetrate most material. With this knowledge, you are now ready to become a full-fledged member of Commander Brinks' "force". Just remember to check your fuel, and that greed never hurts.
